metadata.name: Daisies (Remix) + Mintpass
metadata.description:
This is a remix of the original song Daises under the Moon by krp. 

This is also a MINTPASS to my next song releasing on or before Feb 1st. 

Holders of this NFT will get a Flat 20% discount. 

Name of the remix artist: @accsynth. 
Mixed & mastered by: @accsynth. 
Artwork: @TadziuMusic.

AccSynth is an aspiring producer, who hails from India. He is a self-taught producer and is trained in Hindustani, Carnatic, and the Western style of music for almost 12 years. It has been his long-term vision to transcend any kind of cultural barriers when it comes to music.

The original \"Daisies under the moon\" is a song I, krp, wrote in a countryside in Moscow, Russia in the summer of June this year when I was walking with my wife picking daisies for my mother in law in the wild forest. I walked and came back to the wooden countryside home we were staying in, picked up a guitar and started writing that song... my step dad-in-law was chilling there and my wife too, I distinctly remember.

It's also a song of hope as I narrate, in my native tongue in the bridge-ish portion, imagining myself to be a bird flying in the night sky looking for something, and being reminded somehow, that I belong to the earth not the skies.

Utility:
1. Access to future projects, holders-only concerts and token-gated content, details on my website. 
2. You can get all the stems of this remix & the original on request.
3. Consultation calls with krp &/or AccSynth on mixing/mastering/production inputs on ur song. 

*Legal Notes:
1. Licensing of the songs or artwork to movies or commercial productions is possible, upon discussion with krp & AccSynth. Song can be freely used on your personal social handles with credits. 
2. We do not assure profits or monetary benefits through the resale of this NFT
3. As creators of this song, we are not responsible for any damages that may occur through sale of this NFT. 
4. Full copyright & master rights for this song belong to the artists of this song krp & AccSynth. 
5. A purchase of this NFT does not give the buyer any master rights and copyright to the song.

lyrics.text:
Let me tell of the day 
A tale for the years 
Something to sing by the fire 
A Song to rest your eth on

something to sing when your heart is racing
something to sing when your heart is bleeding

Gungunaye aasmaan mein raat ke andheri mein
teri zameen bulaaye
kahin ghum ho na ho
kahin saans tham na ho
Saveraa hone ko hai

(I hum in the sky, in the darkness of the night,
The earth is calling me 
She says, don't get lost
Don't pass on too soon 
Dawn us yet to be - as in there's miles to go before I die, so keep going despite obstacles) 

Let me sing of the day when the sky was roaring blue
I had my girl by my side
I rode under the sun of june
I sat and picked up daisies under the moon.

Hmmm

Let me tell you of the day 
A tale for the years 
Something to sing by the fire 
A song to rest you eth on
something to sing when your heart is racing
something to sing when your heart is bleeding
